messages.text:
Hello iant, r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Mon, Mar 5, 2012 at 6:53 AM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: iant, r,
>
> Message:
> Hello iant, r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> runtime: add Compiler
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5720073/
>
> Affected files:
>  A src/pkg/runtime/compiler.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/runtime/compiler.go
> ===================================================================
> new file mode 100644
> --- /dev/null
> +++ b/src/pkg/runtime/compiler.go
> @@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
> +// Copyright 2012 The Go Authors.  All rights reserved.
> +// Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style
> +// license that can be found in the LICENSE file.
> +
> +package runtime
> +
> +// Compiler is the name of the compiler toolchain that built the
> +// running binary.  Known toolchains are:
> +//
> +//     gc      The 5g/6g/8g compiler suite at code.google.com/p/go.
> +//     gccgo   The gccgo front end, part of the GCC compiler suite.
> +//
> +const Compiler = "gc"
>
>

*** Submitted as 536be3c2a16a ***

runtime: add Compiler

R=iant, r, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5720073
